name: simplydk
content:
Welcome to RegExr v2.0 by gskinner.com! Edit the Expression & Text to see matches. Roll over matches or the expression for details. Undo mistakes with ctrl-z. Save & Share expressions with friends or the Community. A full Reference & Help is available in the Library, or watch the video Tutorial. Sample text for testing: abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ 0123456789 +-.,!@#$%^&*();\/|<>"' 12345 -98.7 3.141 .6180 9,000 +42 555.123.4567 +1-(800)-555-2468 foo@demo.net bar.ba@test.co.uk www.demo.com http://foo.co.uk/ http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar The phrase "regu;ar expression" is often abbreviated as RegEx or regex. sales1 .xls orders3.xls sales2.xls sales3.xls apac1.xls europe2.xls sam.xls na1.xls na2.xls sa1.xls ca1.xls var myArray = new Array(); ... if (myArray[0] == 0) { ... } myArray[1] myArray[2] /home/ben/sales/simplydkk \home\ben\sales\simplydkk Hello, my name is Ben Forta, and I am the author of books on SQL, ColdFusion, WAP Windows  2000, and other subjects. pinging hog. forta.com[12.159.46.200] with 32 bytes of data: ID:042 SEX:M DOB:1967-08-17 Status:Active

Wecome to my Homepafe

ColdFusion

Information about Macromedia ColdFusion.

Wireless

Information about Bluetooth, 802.11, and more.
